com.werdpressed.partisan.rundo

Interface RunDo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher, WriteToArrayDeque
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunDoNative, RunDoSupport

    public interface RunDo
extends android.text.TextWatcher, WriteToArrayDeque
    RunDo implementations monitor and manipulate EditText fields, by periodically saving snippets of text to Collections and reinstating them through undo() and redo() calls.
    Author:
    Tom Calver

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RunDo.Callbacks
      Implement to receive callbacks whenever undo() or redo() methods are called
      static class  RunDo.Factory
      Returns a RunDo implementation which extends either Fragment or Fragment.
      static interface  RunDo.TextLink
      Used byRunDo implementations to establish a link with an EditText

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.text.NoCopySpan

        android.text.NoCopySpan.Concrete

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllQueues()

      Reverts changes made by the last undo() call.

      Sets size of Undo and Redo queues.

    • Method Detail

      • setQueueSize

        void setQueueSize(int size)
        Sets size of Undo and Redo queues. Default size is 10. Calling this clears any elements already in the queues.
        Parameters:
        size - New queue size

      • setTimerLength

        void setTimerLength(long lengthInMillis)
        Sets time in milliseconds before text is committed to the undo queue. This timer begins immediately after text entry stops, and is reset if text changes before the timer can complete. Default value is 2000.
        Parameters:
        lengthInMillis - Time in milliseconds before text is committed to undo queue

      • undo

        void undo()
        Updates attached EditText with text from the last entry in the undo queue, such that it reverts to an earlier state.

      • redo

        void redo()
        Reverts changes made by the last undo() call.

      • clearAllQueues

        void clearAllQueues()
        Removes all entries from both undo and redo queues.
